Package minesweeper.gui

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CountUpTimer
    Timer class that counts up from seconds to minutes and shows the passed time in the game
    CustomOptionsPanel  
    FrameListener
    FrameListener is used to handle events that are outside of the actual game field
    GameGui
    The main frame of the game.
    GameListener
    The main listener class of the game.
    GameMenuBar
    The menu is used to set up all the game options and difficulty setting.
    ScoreChecker
    This class manages both ScoreSaver and ScoreKeeper.
